definitions: distance traveled or measured southward, especially at sea

examples.text: the object of all vessels using this route is to get sufficient southing off the coast to beat around the Horn despite the violent winds

definitions: a figure or line representing southward distance on a map.
shortDefinitions: figure or line representing southward distance on map

definitions: the transit of a celestial object, especially the sun, across the meridian due south of the observer.
shortDefinitions: transit of celestial object across meridian due south of observer

definitions: the angular distance of a star or other object south of the celestial equator.
shortDefinitions: angular distance of star or other object south of celestial equator
